argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | tsmsinv.b | |- B = ( Base ` G ) |
| 2 |  | tsmsinv.p | |- I = ( invg ` G ) |
| 3 |  | tsmsinv.1 | |- ( ph -> G e. CMnd ) |
| 4 |  | tsmsinv.2 | |- ( ph -> G e. TopGrp ) |
| 5 |  | tsmsinv.a | |- ( ph -> A e. V ) |
| 6 |  | tsmsinv.f | |- ( ph -> F : A --> B ) |
| 7 |  | tsmsinv.x | |- ( ph -> X e. ( G tsums F ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( TopOpen ` G ) = ( TopOpen ` G ) |
| 9 |  | #P_tgptps | |- ( G e. TopGrp -> G e. TopSp ) |
| 10 | 4, 9 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> G e. TopSp ) |
| 11 |  | #P_tgpgrp | |- ( G e. TopGrp -> G e. Grp ) |
| 12 | 4, 11 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> G e. Grp ) |
| 13 |  | #P_isabl | |- ( G e. Abel <-> ( G e. Grp /\ G e. CMnd ) ) |
| 14 | 12, 3, 13 | #P_sylanbrc | |- ( ph -> G e. Abel ) |
| 15 | 1, 2 | #P_invghm | |- ( G e. Abel <-> I e. ( G GrpHom G ) ) |
| 16 | 14, 15 | #P_sylib | |- ( ph -> I e. ( G GrpHom G ) ) |
| 17 |  | #P_ghmmhm | |- ( I e. ( G GrpHom G ) -> I e. ( G MndHom G ) ) |
| 18 | 16, 17 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> I e. ( G MndHom G ) ) |
| 19 | 8, 2 | #P_tgpinv | |- ( G e. TopGrp -> I e. ( ( TopOpen ` G ) Cn ( TopOpen ` G ) ) ) |
| 20 | 4, 19 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> I e. ( ( TopOpen ` G ) Cn ( TopOpen ` G ) ) ) |
| 21 | 1, 8, 8, 3, 10, 3, 10, 18, 20, 5, 6, 7 | #P_tsmsmhm | |- ( ph -> ( I ` X ) e. ( G tsums ( I o. F ) ) ) |
